content.query:
USE SalesDB
GO;

CREATE PROCEDURE sp_create_sales @amount INT
AS
BEGIN
    IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE name='SalesOrders')
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE SalesOrders
    
    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE SalesOrders
    WITH
    (
        LOCATION = 'parquet_orders/orders.parquet', -- Make sure folders doesn't exist
        DATA_SOURCE = files,
        FILE_FORMAT = FormatParquet
    )
    AS
    SELECT Quantity, TotalPrice, ProductId
    FROM OPENROWSET (
        BULK 'csv/orders.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'files',
        FORMAT = 'csv',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS datasource
END

--EXEC sp_create_sales 100
